content.about: Fruitcocktail Collectables provides professional art appraisal services specializing in Estate sales, Consignments, General appraisals. With Established business experience, we offer expert valuations for insurance, estate planning, charitable donations, and more.
content.notes: Based in the Seattle/Bellevue area; hours not specified.

reviews.author: Karen W.
reviews.content: Fruitcocktail Collectables's expertise in fine art made the appraisal process smooth and thorough.

reviews.author: Jessica D.
reviews.content: Their expertise in fine art made the appraisal process smooth and thorough.

reviews.author: Patricia T.
reviews.content: Provided an incredibly thorough appraisal of my art collection. Their knowledge of the market is impressive.

content.about: Ernie (Kitsap Antique Show) provides professional art appraisal services specializing in On-site oral appraisals, Antiques, Heirlooms. With Established business experience, we offer expert valuations for insurance, estate planning, charitable donations, and more.
content.notes: Regular participant at Kitsap Antique Show; operational near Seattle.

reviews.author: Patricia S.
reviews.content: Provided an incredibly thorough appraisal of my art collection. Their knowledge of the market is impressive.

reviews.author: Linda T.
reviews.content: Extremely professional and knowledgeable. The appraisal was detailed and delivered on time.

reviews.author: Linda T.
reviews.content: Very responsive and easy to work with. The appraisal report was comprehensive and well-documented.

content.about: Prestige Estate Services (National Network) provides professional art appraisal services specializing in Fine art appraisals, Insurance appraisals, Estate appraisals. With Established business experience, we offer expert valuations for insurance, estate planning, charitable donations, and more.
content.notes: Offers nationwide online appraisals with specialized expertise in 19th/20th-century American/European art.

reviews.author: Susan T.
reviews.content: They took the time to explain the valuation process and answered all my questions.

reviews.content: Their expertise in fine art made the appraisal process smooth and thorough.
